verses.roman:
'eka-pāśa hao, more deha' bhitara yāite'
prabhu kahe,--'śakti nāhi aṅga cālāite'

synonyms: eka-pāśa hao—kindly turn on one side; more—me; deha'-allow; bhitara—within; yāite—to go; prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; śakti—strength; nāhi—there is not; aṅga cālāite—to move My body.
translation: "Kindly turn on one side. Let me pass to enter the room." However, the Lord replied,"I don't have the strength to move My body."
